page.title: 05P C Caton
page.content: P C Caton is our village policeman. He does not have as many crimes to deal with in our village as he does in Epping, the next town along..There are 40 to 50 other policemen living in the village who keep their eyes open. If people in the village see a suspicious person, they phone P C Caton and lock their windows and doors. 90% co-operate. You have to be 5ft 8 and not colour blind to be a policeman. He has been in the village 6 years and the last 3 years have changed for him. The Airfield has taken a lot of his time. People have to have certificates to say that they own a rifle gun and belong to a club. The village is not as nice as it used to be because there are more bad people.
